title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 883.1 - Schedule of water charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 883.1 - Schedule of water charges

State Regulations

The commission will from time to time, after public notice
and hearing, make, amend and revise a schedule of water charges. Until changed, the charge for water shall be as follows: (a) $102 per million gallons for consumptive
use, subject to paragraph (c) of this section; and
(b) $1.02 per million gallons for
non-consumptive use, subject to paragraph (c) of this
section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
883.1

Amended

New

York State Register July 17, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 29, eff. 7/22/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
